items.strItemDescription: A deadly spear used by the Fire Riders of the Sandsea. Roaming the harsh dunes, they live by their own rules. This item requires a DA.
A deadly spear used by the Fire Riders of the Sandsea. Roaming the harsh dunes, they live by their own rules. This item requires a DA.
Made with hardened leather, imbued with crit-boosting magic, and adorned with cruel spikes. FEEL MY WRATH! This item requires a Dragon Amulet.
A steel blade infused with a blistering cold. Cold hard steel at it's finest! This item requires a Dragon Amulet.
Steel daggers infused with a blistering cold. Cold hard steel at it's finest! This item requires a Dragon Amulet.
A steel rod infused with a blistering cold. Cold hard steel at it's finest! This item requires a Dragon Amulet.
Strap this beautiful Nautiloid shell to your back to boost your wisdom, magical defense and bonus!
Helm worn by the ancient Water Elves, it contains life magic. This item requires a Dragon Amulet.
An ornate golden mantle, blessed with magic.
Strap this beautiful Nautiloid shell to your back to boost your wisdom and magical defense!
A cute set of ears that are magically enhanced.
These gloves have been imbued with crit-boosting magic. The best defense is a good offense! This item requires a Dragon Amulet.
Use this magical amulet in battle to unleash holy protection magic! This item requires a Dragon Amulet.
These gauntlets are made of hardened leather, and come with a lifetime warranty. Or so Teral says, anyway. This item requires a Dragon Amulet.
Tough leather gloves that will withstand the wear and tear of the lifestyle of a monster hunter. This item requires a Dragon Amulet.
This magical eyepiece will enhance your ability to perform critical hits and boost your damage!
This magical tunic provides protection from stun attacks. It pulsates lightly with a golden glow.
This magical tunic provides even more protection from stun attacks. It pulsates lightly with a golden glow.
This tough leather cape is made from the hides of monsters you've defeated in battle.
These are fashioned to look like the wings of the mighty Tamach, a giant energy dragon said to rule a distant land.
A deadly blade embodying powerful wind magic.
A deadly blade embodying powerful wind magic.
A deadly blade embodying powerful wind magic.
This Kehaan helm has been enchanted with potent magic.
Ancient thieves wore such helms.
Ancient wizards wore such helms.
This tough leather cape is made from the hides of monsters you've defeated in battle.
A true trophy hunter wears his prey with pride! Show everyone you've taken down the poisonous Scorpiarc!
This poisonous blade is covered in deadly Scorpiarc venom!
This poisonous blade is covered in deadly Scorpiarc venom!
This poisonous blade is covered in deadly Scorpiarc venom!
This magical amulet contains the power to absorb poison.
This tough leather cape is made from the hides of monsters you've defeated in battle.
Ancient warriors wore such helms.

Forged from the earth, to defend Lore from the evil that devours it.
Forged from the earth, to defend Lore from the evil that devours it.

A big, fur-covered leather guard to protect your behind, and to keep you toasty warm in your travels!
This beautiful rainbow ring will keep you safe from harm.
This holy staff will light your path, and your enemies!
These holy daggers will light your path, and your enemies!
This holy axe will light your path, and your enemies!
A very sturdy belt made from tanned troglomite hide and enchanted with helpful magic.
This magical amulet contains the power to absorb poison.
A Vornian tribal belt. Very few people have ever heard of them, but Teral has learned their ways in his travels.
Show the world you are a monster hunter! Enhances your critical hit chance.
A masterfully forged magical ring to ward off evil.
This weapon seems to glow with a magical radiance. It was forged by melting down and creating an alloy out of nautiloid shells.
This weapon seems to glow with a magical radiance. It was forged by melting down and creating an alloy out of nautiloid shells.

If you equip this ring, you will be recognized and respected as a monster hunter. Take pride in wearing it!
A simple fur cape made from Rhoddhu pelt.
This tough leather cape is made from the hides of monsters you've defeated in battle.
A well-balanced helm for the adventurer. It is enchanted with sight-boosting magic!
A nice, light helm that provides good protection. Great for traveling!
